member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY
member.summary: Contains information about the current system power policy.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.Revision
member.summary: The current structure revision.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.PowerButton
member.summary: A structure that defines the system power action to initiate when the system power button is pressed.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.SleepButton
member.summary: A structure that defines the system power action to initiate when the system sleep button is pressed.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.LidClose
member.summary: A structure that defines the system power action to initiate when the system lid switch is closed.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.LidOpenWake
member.summary: The maximum power state (highest Sx value) from which a lid-open event should wake the system. This member must be one of the enumeration type values.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.Reserved
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.Idle
member.summary: A structure that defines the system power action to initiate when the system idle timer expires.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.IdleTimeout
member.summary: The time that the level of system activity must remain below the idle detection threshold before the system idle timer expires, in seconds.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.IdleSensitivity
member.summary: The level of system activity that defines the threshold for idle detection, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.DynamicThrottle
member.summary: The current system processor dynamic throttling policy. This member must be one of the values described inProcessor Performance Control Policy Constants.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.Spare2
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.MinSleep
member.summary: The minimum system sleep state (lowest Sx value) currently supported. This member must be one of the enumeration type values.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.MaxSleep
member.summary: The maximum system sleep state (highest Sx value) currently supported. This member must be one of the enumeration type values.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.ReducedLatencySleep
member.summary: The system power state (Sx value) to enter on a system sleep action when there are outstanding latency requirements. This member must be one of the enumeration type values. If an application calls with LT_LOWEST_LATENCY, ReducedLatencySleep will be used in place of MaxSleep.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.WinLogonFlags
member.summary: This member can be zero or WINLOGON_LOCK_ON_SLEEP (0x00000001).

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.Spare3
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.DozeS4Timeout
member.summary: The time to wait between entering the suspend state and entering the hibernate sleeping state, in seconds. A value of zero indicates never hibernate.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.BroadcastCapacityResolution
member.summary: The resolution of change in current battery capacity that should cause the system to be notified of a system power state changed event.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.DischargePolicy
member.summary: An array of structures that defines the actions to take at system battery discharge events.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.VideoTimeout
member.summary: The time before the display is turned off, in seconds.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.VideoDimDisplay
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the system includes support for display dimming.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.VideoReserved
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.SpindownTimeout
member.summary: The time before power to fixed disk drives is turned off, in seconds.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.OptimizeForPower
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the system will turn on cooling fans and run the processor at full speed when passive cooling is specified. This causes the operating system to be biased toward using the fan and running the processor at full speed.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.FanThrottleTolerance
member.summary: The lower limit that the processor may be throttled down to prior to turning on system fans in response to a thermal event, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.ForcedThrottle
member.summary: The processor throttle level to be imposed by the system, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.MinThrottle
member.summary: The minimum processor throttle level, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_POLICY.OverThrottled
member.summary: A structure that defines the system power action to initiate in response to a thermal event when processor throttling is unable to adequately reduce the system temperature.
